Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Ridgeway
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale and 26th due to police activity near 26th/Ridgeway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale, then resume their normal route on 26th due to police activity near 26th/Ridgeway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time
